bill.summary:
Housing Opportunities Made Easier Act or the HOME Act
This bill amends the Truth in Lending Act to deem mortgage appraisal services donated by a fee appraiser to an organization that is eligible to receive tax-deductible charitable contributions to be customary and reasonable.
